summary: This document is a financial statement from Fifth Third Bank detailing the account activity for Scio Verum Corporation during the period from November 1, 2015, to November 30, 2015. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and the ending balance, as well as service charge details and criteria for waiving those charges.

persons.name: Scio Verum Corporation
persons.context: Scio Verum Corporation is the account holder for the business checking account detailed in the financial statement.

persons.name: Paychex Inc.
persons.context: Paychex Inc. is mentioned as the provider of payroll services for Scio Verum Corporation, with multiple transactions related to payroll.

keyFacts: The account statement covers the period from November 1, 2015, to November 30, 2015.
The beginning balance was $153,663.87, and the ending balance was $42,539.31.
Total withdrawals during the period amounted to $136,291.65.
Deposits during the same period totaled $25,167.09.
Service charges were waived due to meeting the balance criteria.
